Sink calculator
Hello blank fragment
//Tutorial: Type the name of the item you are about to mage. Pick the item category. Here is the overview panel.
Current sink. 

It is the main parameter in the whole app. 

Sink value would be different in color depending on changes during the maging. Available runes would be listed here: However no characteristics have been chosen yet. 
Let's pick something! 

Press 'Edit Rune List' button.
All available stats are shown in the list: Pick only the ones used in the magus process of current item. To do so just click '+' button on desired stats and they would move to 'Selected' section. 
To deselect the stat just click '-' button. Once everything is set, confirm your choice by clicking 'Apply' button.
All available runes corresponding to stat selected are shown in the list: This shows the rune name and number of stats that would be added to item on success. This shows the rune base positive sink. 

It is specific to the stat. This shows the rune total positive sink. 

Basically it is the amount of sink being consumed to be able to apply this particular rune. To apply the rune and calculate outcome press on the rune row. 

That is corresponding to regular magus action in the game when you have some stats added and removed. 

Try it out now!
Here you can modify your stat values according to magus outcome If you modify the stat which is positive on item, use this field to put outcome results. 

Value would be positive if you gain stat on item and negative otherwise. 

This field would be most commonly used. Use this field ONLY if you modify the stat which is negative on the item. 

Negative sink would be considered in calculations in this case. Since negative sink would not be used very often, 'Negative sink block' is hidden by default. 

You can show it up using this Advance Switch But what to do with CRITICAL FAILURES? 

It is a magus outcome when you have no stats modified, but lose sink equal to rune power. To apply critical failure, just PRESS AND HOLD corresponding rune row. 

In the dialog box with switch you can choose which type of sink you age going to use (positive or negative). 

Confirm your decision to apply action. 

Try it out now! Every single magus action performed in the app are being recorded as a logs. 

You can check it out on the History page. 

Press 'History' button to look at it right now! Logs are being shown here. This is the very beginning on the history. 

The most recent row is on the top. Here is the history message. Here is the result sink. History messages with positive output (where the target stat has been increased) would be green. 

Negative output (all stats or just sink went down) would be red. Now press 'Back' button to move back to the main screen. CONGRATULATIONS! 

Here is the end of tutorial. 
You have successfully learned the basics and ready to perform magus by yourself. 

Tutorial can be run again from title screen anytime. 

Feel free to reach me out if you still have questions or thoughts regarding app improvements.
